Name: Angles
About the game: Angles is an Adventure game set in a Fantasy world based on Britain in the Dark Ages. It features many mythical creatures which have infested the lands outside the Village. You must Journey outside and gather your strength, earning Gold and upgrading your Character. Combat uses a point and click system with range restrictions on Melee weapons. The world is procedurally generated to offer unique hunting grounds when out on an adventure. Currently there are 3 Procedural Environments to explore and Hunt down enemies: - Forest - Mountains - Gobling Lair (1st dungeon) This list will expand as they are completed. (Note: The Free Demo features the First Player Class, Tutorial, Village and 3 Procedural Maps to adventure in, however Saving the game is disabled.)
Meta Title: Angles: Mar 7, 2018, Bio Punk Games and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Angles? Check out the release date (Mar 7, 2018), developer insights from Bio Punk Games, and a complete game summary.
